detail.description: Enjoy a luxurious stay at Le Ayu Villa Canggu. This villa offers total privacy with a modern tropical design, an open-plan living area, and a private pool surrounded by lush gardens.
detail.address: Munduk Tengah Street No. 3, Pererenan, Mengwi District, Badung Regency, Bali 80351
detail.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before arrival date.

detail.roomType: Suite with Private Pool & Gym Access
detail.description: Experience luxury harmonized with spirituality and nature at Sake Bali Suites, Tampaksiring. Located among Bali’s iconic green rice paddies, our suites provide total seclusion for couples. Offering a blend of modern fitness amenities and easy access to historic holy sites, it’s the ultimate sanctuary for wellness and tranquility.
detail.address: Erlangga Street, Manukaya, Tampaksiring District, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80552
facilities: Private Terrace with Rice Field View
detail.cancellationPolicy: Cancellation can be made according to the terms and conditions applicable at the time of booking.

detail.description: Da Vinci The Villa by Nagisa Bali is a magnificent property offering ultimate privacy in the Tumbak Bayuh area. Featuring an elegant architectural design, the villa boasts a spacious semi-open living area, a modern kitchen, and lush tropical gardens overlooking a large private pool. It is ideal for large family vacations or groups seeking luxury amidst the tranquil Balinese countryside.
detail.address: Tumbak Bayuh Street No. 64, Tumbak Bayuh, Mengwi District, Badung Regency, Bali 80351
detail.cancellationPolicy: Cancellation can be made according to the terms and conditions applicable at the time of booking.

detail.description: Discover spacious living at Enchanting Canggu Villa, complete with a private outdoor pool, garden, and BBQ area. Featuring an open-plan layout, full kitchen, and en-suite bedrooms, it is the perfect retreat for families seeking modern comfort in the heart of iconic Canggu.
detail.address: Nelayan Street No. 31, Canggu, North Kuta District, Badung Regency, Bali 80361
detail.cancellationPolicy: Cancellation can be made according to the terms and conditions applicable at the time of booking.

detail.description: Hidden 5BR Gem Luxe Pool Villa offers an exclusive stay in Pererenan, featuring a modern minimalist design blended with tropical comfort. The property boasts a private infinity pool, an expansive open-plan living area, and a fully equipped gourmet kitchen, making it the ideal choice for family gatherings or large groups seeking privacy.
detail.address: Tumbak Bayuh Street No. 64, Tumbak Bayuh, Mengwi District, Badung Regency, Bali 80351
detail.cancellationPolicy: Cancellations made at least 14 days prior to arrival are eligible for a full refund..

detail.description: Sojourn is an exclusive boutique villa in Mengwi that blends modern luxury with the tranquility of the countryside. Featuring an open-space concept with a private pool overlooking emerald rice fields and warm minimalist interiors, it offers a deeply private atmosphere for couples or small families seeking an escape from the city crowds.
detail.address: Raya Duma Street, Mengwi, Mengwi District, Badung Regency, Bali 80351
facilities: Private Pool with Rice Field View
detail.cancellationPolicy: Cancellations made at least 7 days prior to the check-in date are eligible for a full refund.

detail.description: Experience luxury at Villa Kiki Modern Tropical, your stylish sanctuary in central Canggu. This villa boasts three spacious bedrooms, a private pool, and a sleek semi-outdoor lounge. The ideal choice for couples or small groups looking for modern comfort in the heart of Bali’s most vibrant area.
detail.address: Nelayan Street, Canggu, North Kuta District, Badung Regency, Bali 80361
detail.cancellationPolicy: Cancellation terms may vary depending on the platform and time of booking.

detail.description: Predmed Kabaka Resort offers an exclusive escape in the serene village of Kaba-Kaba. The property presents a blend of modern architecture and lush Balinese tropical landscapes, complete with a spacious private pool, an open-air dining area, and soul-soothing rice field views. It is perfectly suited for families seeking an authentic rural atmosphere without compromising on modern resort amenities.
detail.address: Kaba-Kaba Street, Kaba-Kaba, Kediri District, Tabanan Regency, Bali 82121

detail.description: Villa 10 Viber Canggu is a modern oasis for couples seeking comfort and style in Bali's most trendy location. This villa highlights minimalist aesthetics with boho-chic touches, offering a tranquil bedroom area directly connected to a private pool and intimate sun deck. Its strategic location makes it easy to access various beach clubs and popular cafes in the Canggu area.
detail.address: Tegal Sari Street No. 10, Canggu, North Kuta District, Badung Regency, Bali 80361
facilities: En-suite Bathroom with Rain Shower & Bathtub

detail.description: Experience 'chic' tropical luxury at Villa Fleur, where modern aesthetics meet natural elements. detail.description: Riyuri Guesthouse provides comfortable and affordable accommodation in the strategic area of Berawa, Canggu. detail.cancellationPolicy: The cancellation policy at KAPI Sebatu Villa is non-refundable or follows the specific terms of the booking platform used, including full charges for late cancellations within 48 hours or no-shows without prior notice.

detail.description: Villa Dolce Farniente is a luxury accommodation located in the peaceful Tegallalang area of Bali, specifically designed to offer a maximum relaxation experience amidst tropical nature, making it a hidden retreat offering total privacy and a peaceful atmosphere for those seeking spiritual tranquility.
detail.address: Pupuan, Tegallalang District, Gianyar Regency, Bali.
detail.cancellationPolicy: The cancellation policy at Villa Dolce Farniente is non-refundable (cannot be refunded) or follows the specific terms of the booking platform used, including full charges for late cancellations within 48 hours or no-shows without prior notice.

detail.description: Eco Six Bali is a luxurious bamboo resort that offers a unique stay experience in the serene Tampaksiring countryside. This resort combines modern bamboo architecture with traditional Balinese ambiance, creating a peaceful and highly Instagrammable atmosphere.
detail.address: Jl. Raya Ayodya, Tampaksiring, Tampaksiring District, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80552.
detail.cancellationPolicy: The cancellation policy at Eco Six Bali is generally non-refundable (cannot be refunded), especially for bookings made through the official website or promotional prices. However, on certain platforms, free cancellation or schedule changes are sometimes possible if requested 14 to 30 days before the check-in date. Guests are strongly advised to review booking details or contact staff via WhatsApp for specific policies regarding itinerary changes.

detail.description: Royal Kemala Villa is a luxurious bamboo resort that offers a unique stay experience in the serene Tampaksiring countryside. This resort combines modern bamboo architecture with traditional Balinese ambiance, creating a peaceful and highly Instagrammable atmosphere.
detail.address: Jl. Raya Pujung Kaja, Tegallalang, Tegallalang District, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80561.
detail.cancellationPolicy: The cancellation policy at Royal Kemala Villa is highly dependent on the booking platform and the length of stay, where free cancellation is available if done 14 to 30 days before arrival. However, for promotional bookings or during peak season (high season), a Non-Refundable policy (no refund) often applies. If cancellation is made beyond the specified time limit, guests will be charged a fee equal to one night's stay up to the total booking cost. Changes in check-in dates also depend on availability, and for emergency situations (force majeure), refunds typically require supporting documents for consideration by management.
